description:
Steps to reproduce:

> nova flavor-list

Expected:

root_gb and ephemeral_gb returned

Actual:

Only root_gb returned as "disk"
title: Nova flavors api does not report ephemeral_gb

comments.content:
Steps to reproduce:

> nova flavor-list

Expected:

root_gb and ephemeral_gb returned

Actual:

Only root_gb returned as "disk"
